data_table.description: Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ESHACY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: ESHA01
variable.description: V1 ECG available [0=no,1=yes] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: ESHA03
variable.description: ED1 (evolving diagnostic) criteria met [No, yes, no V1] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: ESHA04
variable.description: ED2 (evolving diagnostic) criteria met [no, yes, no V1] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: ESHA05
variable.description: ED3 (evolving diagnostic) criteria met [no, yes, no V1] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: ESHA06
variable.description: ED4 (evolving diagnostic) criteria met [no, yes, no V1] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: ESHA07
variable.description: ED5 (evolving diagnostic) criteria met [no, yes, no V1] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: ESHA08
variable.description: ED6 (evolving diagnostic) criteria met [no, yes, no V1] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: ESHA09
variable.description: ED7 (evolving diagnostic) criteria met [no, yes, no V1] [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Evolving Diagnostic ECG Criteria, exam 2]
